cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Kentico MVP Liam Goldfinch has been busy over the past several months with a series of blog posts about Xperience by Kentico open-source integrations. In this post he covers a new topic - Xperience's powerful administration customization experience using Page Extenders - and shows developers a simple example to get them started.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: How to Easily Extend Xperience by Kentico UI Pages with Page Extenders
